titleStmt.title: Die Sabbathi 28, Februarii. 1645. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for twenty thousand pounds to be paid out of the excise, to the forces raised by the Easterne Association for blocking up Newarke.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, Printer to the Honourable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Henry Elsynge, Cler. Parliam. Dom. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
